QuestData.Title: Bolas and Birds
QuestData.Description: Up in the mountains we know the value of a good hunting companion. We use bolas to shoot down our flying prey, then our retrievers go and bring us our kill!$b$bYou want to take a shot? Nickel can accompany you. Shoot down some of the falcons in the woods. My dog will finish the job.
QuestData.LogDescription: Shoot down $1oa Hollowbeak Falcons with the Bola Launcher.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our retrievers are workers. They aid us in our hunting ventures.
QuestData.RewardText: There's nothing like man and beast working together for a clean hunt!
